sentences.en: A disease, as scurvy , beriberi , or pellagra, caused by deficiency of one or more essential vitamins.
sentences.cn: 由于缺乏基本的营养成分如维生素矿物质等而导致的任何疾病.

sentences.en: A, such as scurvy, beriberi, or, caused by deficiency of one or more essential vitamins.
sentences.cn: 一种存在于新鲜水果(尤其是柑桔类水果)和蔬菜中的维生素;防止坏血病.

sentences.en: Blackthorne was famished and his mouth and body ached from the scurvy.
sentences.cn: 布莱克松早已经饥肠辘辘,经受着败血症的折磨,嘴巴干裂,身体疼痛.

sentences.en: In humans, vitamin C deficiency causes scurvy, and can eventually cause death.
sentences.cn: 人类缺乏维生素C会引起坏血病，最终导致死亡。

sentences.en: No fear of scurvy or ship fever this voyage.
sentences.cn: 那就不必担心路上得坏血症或斑疹伤寒这类疾病了!

sentences.en: Not eating enough of them can result in problems such as scurvy, dermatitis or dry, scaly skin.
sentences.cn: 维生素摄入不足能导致坏血病、皮肤炎或干燥、鳞状皮肤之类的问题。

sentences.en: Oranges, lemons and limes were found to cure scurvy.
sentences.cn: 人们发现橙子、柠檬和酸橙能治疗坏血病。

sentences.en: Scurvy ( or vitamin C deficiency ): Nutritional disorder caused by deficiency of vitamin C.
sentences.cn: 坏血病 ( 亦称维生素C缺乏病 ): 因维生素C缺乏而引起的营养性疾病.

sentences.en: Vitamin A lack of will have nyctalopia , Lack of vitamin C can scurvy.
sentences.cn: 维生素A缺乏会得夜盲症; 维生素C缺乏会得坏血病.

sentences.en: Vitamin C , found in citrus fruits, prevents scurvy.
sentences.cn: 柑桔类水果中含有维生素C, 可防治坏血病.

sentences.en: Vitamin C deficiency can ultimately lead to scurvy.
sentences.cn: 缺乏维生素C最终能道致坏血病.

sentences.en: Vitamin deficiency can cause ill nesses, eg scurvy, rickets.
sentences.cn: 缺乏维生素能引起疾病(如坏血病 、 佝偻病).

sentences.en: Without the vitamin, scurvy would bring on rashes and gum disease, not to mention very bad breath.
sentences.cn: 而坏血病就是由于缺乏维他命而导致的，会引起皮疹，牙周病的症状，口臭就更不在话下。
